And ... I'm an OOP enthusiast (often) encouraging further maturity in 
the=
 use of inheritance within the Java "community".

To that end, when it make=
s sense, the preference is for inheritance 
over declarative programming.  =
And, it would be great to see JUnit 3x 
continue to mature while maintainin=
g its OOP stance.

_Marvin


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Mark Levison" <=
mlevison@...> wrote:
>
> On 9/15/06, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:

I don't =
want an upgraded 3.8.1.

I'm looking to switch to JUnit 4 but get it runnin=
g under Java 1.4. 

In general I also prefer the declarative approach of JU=
nit 4 to the 
inheritance based approach of 3.8.1.
 
> Thanks in advance.
>=
